sentences.en: a nation enriched by oil revenues
sentences.cn: 靠石油收入富裕起来的国家

sentences.en: Add fertilizer to enrich the soil.
After the wheat crop has been gathered, many farmers burn the remains and plough the ash into the soil , so as to enrich the soil.
sentences.cn: 割完小麦后, 许多农夫把麦秸烧掉,并把灰烬埋入土中, 以增加土壤肥力.

sentences.en: By reading we enrich the mind; by conversation we polish it.
sentences.cn: 读书可以充实我们的思维, 谈话可以焕发我们的心思.
装饰品使房间更加华丽.

sentences.en: Education can greatly enrich your life.
sentences.cn: 教育可以大大充实生活。

sentences.en: Good books can enrich man's inner life.
sentences.cn: 好书可以丰富人的精神生活.

sentences.en: He will drain, rather than enrich, the country.
sentences.cn: 他会耗尽而不是增加该国的财富。

sentences.en: In the 1790s Tom Paine taught plebeian radicals that mankind would live in harmony were it not for the vested interest which princes, diplomats and soldiers had in promoting wars to enrich themselves.
sentences.cn: 汤姆·潘恩在18世纪90年代教育平民激进分子时论述到，如果不是为了实现王公、外交官和士兵借发起战争而使自己富有的潜在利益，人类本会生活在和谐之中。

sentences.en: Some cream will enrich the sauce.
sentences.cn: 在调味汁里加一些奶油会使其味道更加丰富.

sentences.en: The farmers ploughed the vegetable leaves back to enrich the soil.
sentences.cn: 农夫们把蔬菜叶犁入土中作肥料.

sentences.en: The study of science has enriched all our lives.
sentences.cn: 科学研究丰富了我们的整个生活。

sentences.en: They beat her, saying,'You are abundant,'so one can enrich oneself at your expense.
sentences.cn: 他们一面揍它一面说 “ 你真富饶”, 于是他们在你身上发财致富.

sentences.en: Those who know how to use the system can enrich themselves at the expense of the very people who work for those companies.
sentences.cn: 那些懂得如何利用现行体制的人使自己富有起来，而代价是牺牲真正为那些公司工作的人。

sentences.en: To make the fissile material, he needs to develop an ability to enrich uranium.
sentences.cn: 为了得到分裂物质，他需要发展浓缩铀的能力。

sentences.en: We should enrich our knowledge step by step.
sentences.cn: 我们应当逐步地丰富自已的知识.

sentences.en: We should enrich our practice with practice.
sentences.cn: 我们应该通过实践来丰富经验.

sentences.en: You should enrich the mind with knowledge.
sentences.cn: 你应该用知识充实头脑.
